results.title: Configure Notion for Single sign-on with Microsoft Entra ID - Microsoft Entra ID
results.description: Learn how to configure single sign-on between Microsoft Entra ID and Notion.

descriptions.content: When you integrate Notion with Microsoft Entra ID, you can: Control in Microsoft Entra ID who has access to Notion.
Create Notion test user In this section, a user called Britta Simon is created in Notion.

results.title: .NET API browser
results.description: Explore Microsoft's comprehensive .NET API browser. Your ultimate resource for all .NET-based APIs. Start your search now.

descriptions.content: Your ultimate resource for all .NET-based APIs.
Notion (Independent Publisher) Notion connector use the API to access Notion's pages, databases, and users.
Retrieve your token's bot user Retrieves the bot User associated with the API token provided in the authorization header.
